title: Petit Collage Wall Decal, Hearts
features: Our collection of Petit Wall Decals take our best-selling wall decals to a new level of whimsy and versatility.
Biodegradable and printed in the U.SA. Lead and phthalate-free, safe for all non-porous surfaces. Packaged flat in an eco-friendly cardboard case.
Contains two 8.5" x 11" sheets of decals. Each circle measures 1.3" x 1.3". Total 70 decals.
A few minutes is all it takes to add modern accents to a corner of a room, a lonely wall, a piece of furniture...no rules apply, so let your inner artist shine through!
The adhesive, vinyl-free decals won't rip, wrinkle or leave residues, and can be repositioned to fit the changing needs of your home (and the changing mind of your child, too).
description: Petit Collage Where Design Meets Play
